summary: Five teenage friends will stop at nothing to attend a concert by their favourite band, The Stone Roses.
cast: Elliott Tittensor|Nico Mirallegro|Adam Long|Jordan Murphy|Oliver Heald|Emilia Clarke|Orla Poole|Antonia Thomas|Robert James-Collier|Philip Jackson|Lesley Manville|Steve Evets|Terry Christian|Billie May Coghill|Sophia Murphy|James Mair|Jack Harper|Jordan Hill|Andrew Knott|Matthew McNulty|Michael Socha|Sean Cernow|Nick Blood|Chris Coghill|Tigga Goulding|Craig Cheetham|Jodie Whittaker|TJ Jones|Bill Rodgers|Abigail Hill|Jake Abraham|Steve Marsh|Jimmy Gallagher|Danny Cunningham|Paul Popplewell|Danny Seymour|Jodie Hamblet|Beatrice Kelley|Ciara Baxendale|Andrew Lythall|Jacob Lakeland|Josh Hussey|Joe Shill|Greg Williams|Jim Sturgess|Mickey O'Brien|Kieran O'Brien|Cressa|Nicky Clarke|Rowetta Satchell|Kaya Scodelario|Charlie Clemmow|The Stone Roses|Charlotte Ashton|Brooklyn Baker|Paul Bergquist|Mark Callum|Pete Couldwell|Kevin Currid|Rob Davis|Don Gayle|Ashley Latham|Daniel Lestuzzi|Claudia Mirallegro|Robert O'Leary|Will Patrick Roberts|Andy Ross|John Thacker|Ernest Vernon|Patricia Winker
title: Spike Island
